item.description:
Hello everyone,
Some of you are wondering why there are so many meet-ups. I just think that many of us live on different schedules and I want to give everyone many opportunities to go to meet-ups. It’s totally fine if it’s only 2, 3 or 4 of us that are coming.

If you are doing twitter please follow me for updates here:
http://twitter.com/wo...
Please join the group on facebook ( a good opportunity to set-up your own profile page if you did not already)
http://www.facebook.c...

Wednesday June 24 an exceptional group is coming to Boston and even so the ticket price is a little high I will be there. The show start at 8 PM but I think that there is an opening act. We could meet in front of the Paradise Club.

If you are into Afrobeat, this is the artist that you don't want to miss! I have seen Femi Kuti a few times and I have never been disappointed
They've got it all: a killer rhythm & percussions section, back-up vocalist and dancers that are so hot they'll give you chills, a huge horn section totally disciplined and always grooving.

Femi Kuti is definitely a top African artist, he is an amazing vocalist, an outstanding sax player that have found his own voice and he keeps coming with great, new and refreshing compositions!
In my book he is holding high the Afrobeat flame started by his father.

http://www.myspace.co...

WED, June 24

FEMI KUTI

(from Nigeria / Afrobeat)

Paradise Rock Club

967 Commonwealth Avenue

Boston, MA

For info/tickets: www.LiveNation.com $25
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the club at 8:00 PM
item.name: Femi Kuti
